name: Harlus
title: The Great King
instructions: Two cities (three yellow) within 3 tiles of each other

name: Melia
title: Swamp Huntress
instructions: Two connected hexes with at least 2 blue cubes and 1 green cube
reward_text: Whenever a new swamp (2 blue 1 green) is created - score 1 vp

name: Kilgor
title: Gilded Priest
instructions: 3 brown cubes and 2 yellow cubes in the same tile
reward_text: At the end of the game score 5 VPs for each hex with at least 3 brown and 2 yellow cubes

name: Mirbo
title: Nihilistic Shaman
instructions: A tile empty of cubes except for consecration
reward_text: Instead of playing an intent and an object you can play two objects of the same name as 'Destroy [Object]'
